mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity (activityId, activityName, activityDesc, strategyId, beginDateTime, endDateTime, stockCount, stockSurplusCount, takeCount, state, creator, createTime, updateTime) VALUES (#{activityId}, #{activityName}, #{activityDesc}, #{strategyId},#{beginDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{stockCount},#{stockSurplusCount}, #{takeCount}, #{state}, #{creator}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT activityId, activityName, activityDesc, strategyId,beginDateTime, endDateTime, stockCount,stockSurplusCount, takeCount, state, creator, createTime, updateTime FROM activity WHERE activityId = #{activityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET stockSurplusCount = stockSurplusCount - 1 WHERE activityId = #{activityId} AND stockSurplusCount > 0
